pages.text: Jewels can roll a variety of Jewel modifiers.$(br2)They have $(l)prefixes$() and $(l)suffixes$(), which are the modifiers they add.$(br2)These can range anywhere from $(l)mining speed$() to Overworld $(l)unbreakability$().$(br2)$(l)Legendary modifiers$() can also be found on Jewels. These are of a $(l)higher tier$().

pages.title: Jewel Modifiers
pages.text: $(br)Jewel Modifiers can give a Vault Tool the corresponding $(l)functionality$(). This means a base Pick could function as an Axe.$(br2)Chests within Vaults can be broken with their $(l)Affinities$(). These are required to $(l)instantly$() break all Chest types, except Wooden Chests.

pages.title: Prefixes
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Wooden Affinity$()$(li2)Wooden Chest mining speed$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Gilded Affinity$()$(li2)Gilded Chest mining speed$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Living Affinity$()$(li2)Living Chest mining speed$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Ornate Affinity$()$(li2)Ornate Chest mining speed$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Coin Affinity$()$(li2)Coin Pile mining speed$()

pages.title: Suffixes
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Mining Speed$()$(li2)Mining speed$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Durability$()$(li2)Durability$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Copiously$()$(li2)Ore duplication odds$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Item Quantity$()$(li2)Amount of loot$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Item Rarity$()$(li2)Quality of loot$()

pages.title: Suffixes
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Soulbound$()$(li2)Keeps item on death$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Trap Disarm Chance$()$(li2)Trapped Chest disarm odds$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Vanilla Immortality$()$(li2)Overworld unbreakability$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Reach$()$(li2)Additional reach$()$(br)$(li)$(l)Hammer Size$()$(li2)Radius for a Hammer$()
